name: Cain - F - Nub 460
additionalNotes: The Cain brand is handmade at the award-winning Oliva factory in Estel√≠, Nicaragua. Cain F is drafted from a potent and peppery Ligero-laden recipe of premium Nicaraguan long-fillers beneath a shimmering Cuban-seed wrapper leaf. Notes of cayenne, black peppery, hickory, and leather populate the full-bodied profile of Cain F. Fans of stronger smokes love the robust taste and aroma Cain F delivers. Add Cain F to the coolerdor when you need cigars with a beefy, peppery zest and plenty of complexity. Choose from a handful of classic shapes blended to a consistent, flawless standard.
